Enumeration Type Documentation

enum pContactPairFlags

Contact pair flags.

See also:
NxUserContactReport.onContactNotify() NxActor::setContactReportThreshold
Enumerator:
CPF_IgnorePair 

disable contact generation for this pair

CPF_OnStartTouch 

pair callback will be called when the pair starts to be in contact

CPF_OnEndTouch 

pair callback will be called when the pair stops to be in contact

CPF_OnTouch 

pair callback will keep getting called while the pair is in contact

CPF_OnImpact 

[not yet implemented] pair callback will be called when it may be appropriate for the pair to play an impact sound

CPF_OnRoll 

[not yet implemented] pair callback will be called when the pair is in contact and rolling.

CPF_OnSlide 

[not yet implemented] pair callback will be called when the pair is in contact and sliding (and not rolling).

CPF_Forces 

the (summed total) friction force and normal force will be given in the nxcontactpair variable in the contact report.

CPF_OnStartTouchForceThreshold 

pair callback will be called when the contact force between two actors exceeds one of the actor-defined force thresholds

CPF_OnEndTouchForceThreshold 

pair callback will be called when the contact force between two actors falls below the actor-defined force thresholds

CPF_OnTouchForceThreshold 

pair callback will keep getting called while the contact force between two actors exceeds one of the actor-defined force thresholds

CPF_ContactModification 

generate a callback for all associated contact constraints, making it possible to edit the constraint. this flag is not included in CPFall for performance reasons.

See also:
nxusercontactmodify
enum pContactModifyMask
Enumerator:
CMM_None 

No changes made.

CMM_MinImpulse 

Min impulse value changed.

CMM_MaxImpulse 

Max impulse value changed.

CMM_Error 

Error vector changed.

CMM_Target 

Target vector changed.

CMM_LocalPosition0 

Local attachment position in shape 0 changed.

CMM_LocalPosition1 

Local attachment position in shape 1 changed.

CMM_LocalOrientation0 

Local orientation (normal, friction direction) in shape 0 changed.

CMM_LocalOrientation1 

Local orientation (normal, friction direction) in shape 1 changed.

CMM_StaticFriction0 

Static friction parameter 0 changed. (Note: 0 does not have anything to do with shape 0/1).

CMM_StaticFriction1 

Static friction parameter 1 changed. (Note: 1 does not have anything to do with shape 0/1).

CMM_DynamicFriction0 

Dynamic friction parameter 0 changed. (Note: 0 does not have anything to do with shape 0/1).

CMM_DynamicFriction1 

Dynamic friction parameter 1 changed. (Note: 1 does not have anything to do with shape 0/1).

CMM_Restitution 

Restitution value changed.

CMM_Force32 

Not a valid flag value, used by the enum to force the size to 32 bits.

enum pRaycastBit

Specifies which informations should be generated(when used as hint flags for ray casting methods).

Enumerator:
RCH_Shape 

"shape" member of NxRaycastHit is valid

RCH_Impact 

"worldImpact" member of NxRaycastHit is valid

RCH_Normal 

"worldNormal" member of NxRaycastHit is valid

RCH_FaceIndex 

"faceID" member of NxRaycastHit is valid

RCH_Distance 

"distance" member of NxRaycastHit is valid

RCH_UV 

"u" and "v" members of NxRaycastHit are valid

RCH_FaceNormal 

Same as RCH_NORMAL but computes a non-smoothed normal.

RCH_Material 

"material" member of NxRaycastHit is valid

enum pFilterOp

Collision filtering operations.

See also:
pGroupsMask
enum pShapesType

Used to specify which types(static or dynamic) of shape to test against when used with raycasting and overlap test methods in pWorld.

Enumerator:
ST_Static 

Hits static shapes.

ST_Dynamic 

Hits dynamic shapes.

ST_All 

Hits dynamic and static shapes.

enum pTriggerFlags

Flags which affect the behavior of NxShapes.

See also:
pRigidBody.setTriggerFlags()
Enumerator:
TF_Disable 

Disables trigger callback.

TF_OnEnter 

Trigger callback will be called when a shape enters the trigger volume.

TF_OnLeave 

Trigger callback will be called after a shape leaves the trigger volume.

TF_OnStay 

Trigger callback will be called while a shape is intersecting the trigger volume.
